actions.committee: Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to reduce Federal crop insurance subsidies, and for other purposes.
short_title: Crop Insurance Subsidy Reduction Act of 2013

summary.text: Crop Insurance Subsidy Reduction Act of 2013 - Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to reduce crop insurance premium subsidy rates.

titles.title: Crop Insurance Subsidy Reduction Act of 2013
A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to reduce Federal crop insurance subsidies, and for other purposes.
